snippet.title: Rocksmith - Official Launch Trailer (FULL HD)
snippet.description:
Rock out to your favorite artists and hits while learning to play the guitar in Rocksmith.

ABOUT THIS GAME
************************
Rocksmith, a new game that lets you plug any guitar into your PC, Xbox 360 or PS3 system. It will offer a vast library of songs from different music genres and will challenge you to step away from the notes on screen and play songs by memory. The game is scheduled for October 18, 2011 and will be available at all major retailers for $79.99.

Rocksmith
*************
GENRE: Music
RELEASE DATE(S): 
+ US: October 18, 2011
+ EU: October 18, 2011
PLATFORM: Xbox 360
ALSO ON: PS3, PC
WEBSITE: http://www.rocksmith.com/
AVAILABLE @ AMAZON: http://amzn.to/l232je

PUBLISHER: Ubisoft
DEVELOPER: Ubisoft
ESRB: RP for Rating Pending
